column5: Hi all,  Just organising some of my 2 million (well.....seems like 2 million) icefishing pictures that i've taken in the last 3 years sincce i moved to Canada.  Came across this one of my buddy Matt. Looks like he has a slight flatulent problem....lol.....his butt is on fire in fact!  It is the paper mill's smoke stack in the backround....but made me laugh....never noticed it before.    DONT EAT BEANS MATT!!!!
Great way to stop people from crowding your spot.
Zip up nice and tight. The exhaust keeps you warm.  Shower when you get home.
if he starts blowing smoke rings he's just showing off...
